wikipedia_page.main: Paul Esposti (born 1 November 1972) is a Welsh racing cyclist, from Cardiff, Wales. who finished 5th in the Road Race at the 1998 Commonwealth Games in Kuala Lumpur. He now lives in Colorado, United States.
